com.ephesoft.dcma.regex

Class HOCRFileReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.dcma.regex.HOCRFileReader

  • public final class HOCRFileReader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to read the HOCR files. Read the file line by line and provide the whole file as string output.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft
    See Also:
    Extraction

      static HOCRFileReader getInstance()
      Return the HOCRFileReader object for singleton design pattern.
      java.lang.String readHOCRFile(java.lang.String pathOfHOCRFile)
      This method reads a text file line by line and add to the StringBuilder.

      • readHOCRFile

        public java.lang.String readHOCRFile(java.lang.String pathOfHOCRFile)
                              throws DCMAApplicationException
        This method reads a text file line by line and add to the StringBuilder. It uses FileInputStream to read the file.
        Parameters:
        pathOfHOCRFile - String
        Returns:
        infoHOCRFile String
        Throws:
        DCMAApplicationException - Check for input parameters and read the file.
